title: Standard deviation in study of self-actualization

content.question: Mean Standard deviation Freshmen 6 4.3 Sophomores 7 4.1 Juniors 8 3.6 Seniors 9 2.2 Each year Maslow High School administers a self-actualization scale to all their students. The table provides students’ scores on the scale. Based on the data, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The range of the mean scores is 7.5.
The scores of the freshmen are more spread out than the seniors’ scores.
The mean score and the standard deviation score are positively correlated.
The data is qualitative, so it is difficult to establish significance.

content.answer: The scores of the freshmen are more spread out than the seniors’ scores.

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
